project.name: CloudKid Animation API
project.description: CloudKid Animation API: A library for playing Animations

cloudkid.Animator.name: cloudkid.Animator
cloudkid.Animator.description:
Animator is a static class designed to provided
base animation functionality, using frame labels of MovieClips
cloudkid.Animator.author: Matt Karl, Andrew Start

cloudkid.AnimatorTimeline.name: cloudkid.AnimatorTimeline
cloudkid.AnimatorTimeline.description:
Animator Timeline is a class designed to provide
base animation functionality
cloudkid.AnimatorTimeline.author: Matt Karl, Andrew Start

cloudkid.CharacterClip.name: cloudkid.CharacterClip
cloudkid.CharacterClip.description: CharacterClip is used by the CharacterController class

params.name: event
params.description: Animator event to play

params.name: loops
params.description: The number of loops

cloudkid.CharacterController.name: cloudkid.CharacterController
cloudkid.CharacterController.description:
Character Controller class is designed to play animated
sequences on the timeline. This is a flexible way to
animate characters on a timeline
cloudkid.CharacterController.author: Matt Moore

cloudkid.PixiAnimator.name: cloudkid.PixiAnimator
cloudkid.PixiAnimator.description: [PIXI Only] Animator for interacting with Spine animations
cloudkid.PixiAnimator.author: Andrew Start

cloudkid.PixiAnimator.AnimTimeline.name: cloudkid.PixiAnimator.AnimTimeline
cloudkid.PixiAnimator.AnimTimeline.description: [Pixi Only] Internal PixiAnimator class for keeping track of animations

params.name: clip
params.description: The AnimTimeline's clip

params.name: callback
params.description: The function to call when the clip is finished playing

params.name: speed
params.description: The speed at which the clip should be played

classitems.description: The current version of the Animator class
classitems.name: VERSION

classitems.description: If we fire debug statements
classitems.name: debug

classitems.description:
The instance of cloudkid.Audio or cloudkid.Sound for playing audio along with animations.
This MUST be set in order to play synced animations.
classitems.name: soundLib

classitems.description: The global captions object to use with animator
classitems.name: captions

classitems.description: The collection of timelines
classitems.name: _timelines

classitems.description:
A collection of timelines for removal - kept out here so it doesn't need to be
reallocated every frame
classitems.name: _removedTimelines

classitems.description: If the Animator is paused
classitems.name: _paused

classitems.description:
Sets the variables of the Animator to their defaults. Use when _timelines is null,
if the Animator data was cleaned up but was needed again later.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: Stops all animations and cleans up the variables used.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Play an animation for a frame label event
classitems.name: play

params.name: instance
params.description: The timeline to animate

params.name: event
params.description: The frame label event (e.g. "onClose" to "onClose stop")

params.name: options
params.description: The object of optional parameters or onComplete callback function

props.name: onComplete
props.description: The callback function when the animation is done

props.name: onCompleteParams
props.description: Parameters to pass to onComplete function

props.name: startTime
props.description: The time in milliseconds into the animation to start. A value of -1 makes the animation play at a random startTime.

props.name: speed
props.description: The speed at which to play the animation.

props.name: soundData
props.description:
soundData Data about a sound to sync the animation to, as an alias or in the format {alias:"MyAlias", start:0}.
		start is the seconds into the animation to start playing the sound. If it is omitted or soundData is a string, it defaults to 0.

props.name: doCancelledCallback
props.description: Should an overridden animation's callback function still run?

classitems.description: Play an animation for a frame label event, starting at a random frame within the animation
classitems.name: playAtRandomFrame

params.name: instance
params.description: The timeline to animate.

params.name: event
params.description: The frame label event (e.g. "onClose" to "onClose_stop").

params.name: options
params.description: The object of optional parameters or onComplete callback function

props.name: onComplete
props.description: The callback function when the animation is done

props.name: onCompleteParams
props.description: Parameters to pass to onComplete function

props.name: speed
props.description: The speed at which to play the animation.

props.name: soundData
props.description:
soundData Data about a sound to sync the animation to, as an alias or in the format {alias:"MyAlias", start:0}.
		start is the seconds into the animation to start playing the sound. If it is omitted or soundData is a string, it defaults to 0.

props.name: doCancelledCallback
props.description: Should an overridden animation's callback function still run?

classitems.description: Creates the AnimatorTimeline for a given animation
classitems.name: _makeTimeline

params.name: instance
params.description: The timeline to animate

params.name: event
params.description: The frame label event (e.g. "onClose" to "onClose stop")

params.name: onComplete
params.description: The function to callback when we're done

params.name: onCompleteParams
params.description: Parameters to pass to onComplete function

params.name: speed
params.description: The speed at which to play the animation.

params.name: soundData
params.description: Data about sound to sync the animation to.

classitems.description: Checks if animation exists
classitems.name: _makeTimeline

params.name: instance
params.description: The timeline to check

params.name: event
params.description: The frame label event (e.g. "onClose" to "onClose stop")

classitems.description: Stop the animation.
classitems.name: stop

params.name: instance
params.description: The MovieClip to stop the action on

params.name: doOnComplete
params.description: If we are suppose to do the complete callback when stopping (default is false)

classitems.description:
Stop all current Animator animations.
This is good for cleaning up all animation, as it doesn't do a callback on any of them.
classitems.name: stopAll

params.name: container
params.description: Optional - specify a container to stop timelines contained within

classitems.description: Remove a timeline from the stack
classitems.name: _remove

params.name: doOnComplete
params.description: If we do the on complete callback

classitems.description: Pause all tweens which have been excuted by Animator.play()
classitems.name: pause

classitems.description: Resumes all tweens executed by the Animator.play()
classitems.name: resume

classitems.description: Pauses or unpauses all timelines that are children of the specified DisplayObjectContainer.
classitems.name: pauseInGroup

params.name: paused
params.description: If this should be paused or unpaused

params.name: container
params.description: The container to stop timelines contained within

classitems.description: Get the timeline object for an instance
classitems.name: getTimeline

params.name: instance
params.description: MovieClip

classitems.description: Whether the Animator class is currently paused.
classitems.name: getPaused

classitems.description: Start the updating
classitems.name: _startUpdate

classitems.description: Stop the updating
classitems.name: _stopUpdate

classitems.description: The update every frame

params.name: elapsed
params.description: The time in milliseconds since the last frame

classitems.description: The sound has been started
classitems.name: onSoundStarted

classitems.description: The sound is done
classitems.name: onSoundDone

classitems.description: Check to see if we have timeline
classitems.name: _hasTimelines

classitems.description: String representation of this class
classitems.name: toString

classitems.description: The event to callback when we're done
classitems.name: onComplete

classitems.description: The parameters to pass when completed
classitems.name: onCompleteParams

classitems.description: The event label
classitems.name: event

classitems.description: The instance of the timeline to animate
classitems.name: instance

classitems.description: The frame number of the first frame
classitems.name: firstFrame

classitems.description: The frame number of the last frame
classitems.name: lastFrame

classitems.description: If the animation loops - determined by looking to see if it ends in " stop" or " loop"
classitems.name: isLooping

classitems.description: Ensure we show the last frame before looping
classitems.name: isLastFrame

classitems.description: length of timeline in frames
classitems.name: length

classitems.description: If this timeline plays captions
classitems.name: useCaptions

classitems.description: If the timeline is paused.
classitems.name: _paused

classitems.description: Sets and gets the animation's paused status.
classitems.name: paused

classitems.description: The animation start time in seconds on the movieclip's timeline.
classitems.name: startTime

classitems.description: The animation duration in seconds.
classitems.name: duration

classitems.description: The animation speed. Default is 1.
classitems.name: speed

classitems.description: The position of the animation in seconds.
classitems.name: time

classitems.description: Sound alias to sync to during the animation.
classitems.name: soundAlias

classitems.description: A sound instance object from cloudkid.Sound or cloudkid.Audio, used for tracking sound position.
classitems.name: soundInst

classitems.description: If the timeline will, but has yet to play a sound.
classitems.name: playSound

classitems.description: The time (seconds) into the animation that the sound starts.
classitems.name: soundStart

classitems.description: The time (seconds) into the animation that the sound ends
classitems.name: soundEnd

classitems.description: The event to play
classitems.name: event

classitems.description: The number of times to loop
classitems.name: loops

classitems.description: Initialiaze this character clip
classitems.name: initialize

params.name: event
params.description: The frame label to play using Animator.play

params.name: loops
params.description: The number of times to loop, default of 0 plays continuously

classitems.description: The currently playing animation
classitems.name: _currentAnimation

classitems.description: Current number of loops for the current animation
classitems.name: _loops

classitems.description: If the current animation choreographies can't be interrupted
classitems.name: _interruptable

classitems.description: If frame dropping is allowed for this animation set
classitems.name: _allowFrameDropping

classitems.description: The current character
classitems.name: _character

classitems.description: Callback function for playing animation
classitems.name: _callback

classitems.description: If this instance has been destroyed
classitems.name: _destroyed

classitems.description: Initiliazes this Character controller
classitems.name: initialize

classitems.description: Set the current character, setting to null clears character
classitems.name: setCharacter

params.name: character
params.description: MovieClip

classitems.description: If we want to play a static frame
classitems.name: gotoFrameAndStop

params.name: event
params.description: The frame label to stop on

classitems.description: Will play a sequence of animations
classitems.name: playClips

params.name: clips
params.description: an array of CharacterClip objects

params.name: callback
params.description:
Callback for when the animations are either done, or
            have been interrupted. Will pass true is interrupted,
            false if they completed

params.name: interruptable
params.description: If calling this can interrupt the current animation(s)

params.name: cancelPreviousCallback
params.description: Cancel the callback the last time this was called

params.name: allowFrameDropping
params.description: If frame dropping is allowed for this frame, if the cloudkid.Animator is doing frame drop checks

classitems.description: Start the next animation in the sequence
classitems.name: startNext

classitems.description: When the animation has completed playing
classitems.name: _animationComplete

classitems.description: Clear any animations for the current character
classitems.name: clear

classitems.description: Don't use after this
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: A reference to this instance of PixiAnimator. This is internal to PixiAnimator and can't be accessed externally.
classitems.name: _instance

classitems.description: The collection of AnimTimelines that are playing
classitems.name: _timelines

classitems.description: The number of animations
classitems.name: _numAnims

classitems.description:
A string reference to PixiAnimator's update callback
so it can be removed in the event that there are no
animations to play
classitems.name: _updateAlias

classitems.description: The function that PixiAnimator uses for update calls. Do not modify.
classitems.name: _boundUpdate

classitems.description: The instance of cloudkid.Audio or cloudkid.Sound for playing audio along with animations.
classitems.name: soundLib

classitems.description: Stored collection of AnimTimelines. This is internal to PixiAnimator and can't be accessed externally.
classitems.name: _animPool

classitems.description: The global captions object to use with animator
classitems.name: captions

classitems.description: Initializes the singleton instance of PixiAnimator.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: Getter for the reference to this instance of PixiAnimator
classitems.name: instance

classitems.description: Play a specified animation
classitems.name: play

params.name: clip
params.description: The clip to play

params.name: anim
params.description: The alias for the animation to play

params.name: options
params.description: The object of optional parameters or onComplete callback function

props.name: callback
props.description: The function to call once the animation has finished

props.name: speed
props.description: The speed at which to play the animation

props.name: startTime
props.description: The time in milliseconds into the animation to start.

props.name: soundData
props.description:
Data about a sound to sync the animation to, as an alias or in the format {alias:"MyAlias", start:0}.
       start is the seconds into the animation to start playing the sound. If it is omitted or soundData is a string, it defaults to 0.

classitems.description: Checks to see if a Spine animation includes a given animation alias
classitems.name: instanceHasAnimation

params.name: instance
params.description: The animation to search. This has to be a Spine animation.

params.name: anim
params.description: The animation alias to search for

return.description: Returns true if the animation is found

classitems.description: Checks to see if a Spine animation includes a given animation alias
classitems.name: checkSpineForAnimation

params.name: clip
params.description: The spine to search

params.name: anim
params.description: The animation alias to search for

return.description: Returns true if the animation is found

params.name: doCallback

Put an AnimTimeline back into the general pool after it's done playing
